Banner.name: Yasmin Kasem
Banner.Description: I have 3 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and sometimes in React, next applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 3 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing SEO, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with Node and Mongo. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Build Responsive design that compatible with different screens

Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Dashboard
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Our innovative Dashboard Application offers a seamless experience for managing and visualizing data. It features secure login and sign-up pages, using an authentication guard to ensure only authorized users can access specific pages.The customizable dashboard provides real-time data updates. Users can easily manage posts and cards, with options to add, edit, delete, and filter content. A visual editor enhances the creation and modification process.Powerful filtering and sorting options help users organize information effectively. Ideal for businesses, professionals, and developers, this app combines functionality, security, and user-friendliness for data visualization, reporting, and management.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Real State
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The Real Estate is a static page created with HTML , CSS, and Bootstrap, provides a sleek and responsive interface for users . Users can view property information, including images, descriptions, and prices, The design features an accessible navigation bar, a responsive layout that adapts to any device, and a footer with quick links, social media icons, and contact information.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Investor PSD
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The Investor is a static page created with HTML , CSS, provides a sleek and responsive interface for users. The design features an accessible navigation bar, a responsive layout that adapts to any device.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
